channel.description: Week 9 Announcements This Week Tue 10/21: Discuss 3 Wed 10/22: Lab 4 Quizzes Fri 10/24: Lab 4 Tue 10/28: Discuss 2 Lab 4 Windows Server VM Active Directory OpenLDAP Configure Clients Configure Interop MAKE SNAPSHOTS Lab 4 Setup Lab 3 DNS & DHCP Server Lab 3 Static DNS Hosts File Entries Lab 4 Grading Windows Server Windows AD User/Group Windows -> AD OpenLDAP User/Group Ubuntu -> LDAP Ubuntu -> AD Lab 5 Move to Cloud 2 Droplets on DO Set up SSH & Firewall Simple Apache Sites DNS Name Docker Reverse Proxy GitHub Pack https://education.github.com/pack
